WorkItem.Description:
Hi,

I'm trying to stream my webcam video output over VLC by HTTP or RTSP protocol.

The streaming is working properly from VLC player (ubuntu) to VLC player (android), but fails when I tries from VLC player (ubuntu) to VR player (android).

Steps to reproduce:
- Stream video over VLC HTTP in PC (http://192.168.1.100:8090/) 
- Open VR Player (android)
- Select "Open Url"
- Insert the url path: http://192.168.1.100:8090/
- The message is popup: "Media could not be found"

or
- Stream video over VLC RTSP in PC (rtsp://192.168.1.100:8554/)
- Open VR Player (android)
- Select "Open Url"
- Insert the url path: rtsp://192.168.1.100:8554/
- The message is popup: "Media could not be found"

Am I doing something wrong? Is it possible stream the webcam output to VR Player?

Tks,
Guilherme Chinellato
WorkItem.Summary: VR Player android: video streaming HTTP or RTSP
